name: H7 TABS
author: Hameed Ullah

sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file named “h7tabs.zip”.
  2. In admin panel click “Plugins->Add New” and select the zip file downloaded and click “Upload now”.
  3. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  4. Click H7 Tabs menu that will show the list of available tabs with their shortcodes.
    5, And Best of Luck
sections.description:
H7 Tabs is a WordPress plugin which allows you to add tabs to your website pages. You can display both vertical and horizontal tabs style using this plugin.

FEATURES

Easy install
75 Transition Effects
Shortcode supported
HTML Supported
Responsive
Compatible with all major browsers
Font Awesome Icons
CSS3
Full of Choices

DEMO

Click here to view Demo

SHORCODE

[h7tabs id=1]

  3. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  4. Click H7 Tabs menu that will show the list of available tabs with their shortcodes.
